metadata.title: CVE-2019-19378 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted btrfs filesystem image canlead to slab-out-of-bounds write access in index_rbio_pages infs/btrfs/raid56.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
